name: Mines of Gloria
description:
Welcome to Mines of Gloria, the ultimate clicker game for all the mining enthusiasts out there! In this game, you get to play as a pixelated dwarves who love nothing more than digging deep into the earth in search of precious gold and gems.

Fortunately, you won't be alone on your mining adventure. You can hire other dwarves to help you out, each with their own unique skills and abilities. With the right team by your side, you'll be able to dig deeper and faster than ever before, uncovering even more valuable treasures along the way.

So, what are you waiting for? Grab your pickaxe and start digging your way to riches in Mines of Gloria!

Controls:

  • Click with Mouse
  • Dig with Space
  • Buy Dwarves with 1, 2, 3, 4
  • Mute/Unmute with M/U
